oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Princess Feather pattern quilt square
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Quilt square made by Nancy Catherine Weeks Bolan (1824-1903), mother of Elmira Jane Bolan Shaver (1841-1909). Elmira married John Quincy Adams Shaver (1833-1903), Co. D, 19th Tenn. Inf. Regt., CSA, on Dec. 25, 1860. Both families lived in Rhea County during the war. The quilt is hand appliqu�d and quilted. The beige color, exhibited on some of the fabric pieces, is typical of the fading process for many of the post-1860 single-process synthetic green dyes when they are exposed to light.
